entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Showers ending early this evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 5:38 PM EDT Friday 5 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High 13. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:38 PM EDT Friday 5 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 5:38 PM EDT Friday 5 May 2023
